code: import React from'react';import{capitalizeLetter}from'../../utils';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import ChartDataLabels from'chartjs-plugin-datalabels';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend,ChartDataLabels);export default function StatData(_ref){var pokemon=_ref.pokemon;var labels=pokemon.stats.map(function(stats){return capitalizeLetter(stats.stat.name);});var dataValues=pokemon.stats.map(function(stat){return stat.base_stat;});var data={labels:labels,datasets:[{data:dataValues,backgroundColor:"#fcba03",borderColor:"#fcba03",borderWidth:1}]};var options={indexAxis:'y',scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true,color:'white',ticks:{color:'white',font:{size:11}}},x:{suggestedMax:150,color:'white',ticks:{color:'white',font:{size:16}}}},plugins:{legend:{display:false},datalabels:{color:'white',font:{size:16},anchor:'end',align:'start',formatter:function formatter(value){return value;},offset:-35},border:{borderColor:'white',borderWidth:2}},maintainAspectRatio:false,color:'white',barThickness:30};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"StatData",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:"Stats"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-graph type-border",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{options:options,data:data})})]});}
